about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in powerful, energetic music celebrating the Beauty of nature!

From Mating Rituals of the Monarch Butterfly to Coming of Age of Jumping Spider to the life agonies of a Parasitic Wasp, this collection has it all!

Featuring 18 original soundtracks written exclusively for Nature & Life - Drunk On Nectar, each music is themed around a particular species, life episode or gameplay scenario in the game.
